title: Axiomatic Policy Constraint Schema (APCS)
description: Defines the standard declarative structure for policy rules and constraints consumed by the GAX Constraint Validation Engine.

Scope.description: Defines the execution context (e.g., 'resource/storage', 'api/user'). Used for load optimization.

Rule.description: The specific constraint to be evaluated.

Field.description: The declarative field name, resolved via stateVectorMap (e.g., 'Target.Scope').

Operator.description: The symbolic operator, resolved via operatorFunctions (e.g., 'EQ', 'GTE').

Value.description: The comparative value used against the runtime state.

Effect.description: The consequence of a successful rule match.
